info.name: py-rest-client
info.summary: Py-Rest-Client is a useful lib for programmers who work with clients for REST API. In simply and easy way you can build Endpoint classes where you put endpoint settings.In that case you have clean structure of endpoints in your code. This lib is only for consume REST API endpoints.
